scripts.postinstall: i="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"; [ -z "$i" ] && i=~/.config; i="$i/fish/functions"; cp -f fisher.fish "$i/fisher.fish"; echo '\033[47m\033[30mPlease reload your shell to start using fisherman.\033[0m'
scripts.preuninstall: i="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"; [ -z "$i" ] && i=~/.config; i="$i/fish/functions"; rm -f "$i/fisher.fish"; echo '\033[47m\033[30mPlease run ``functions -e fisher`` to unload fisherman from your session.\033[0m'
